metadata.Title: CVE-2018-5804 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: A type confusion error within the "identify()" function(internal/dcraw_common.cpp) in LibRaw versions prior to 0.18.8 can beexploited to trigger a division by zero.

criterions.comment: ufraw: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
